forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 66F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. N winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 51F. NNW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High near 20C. NNE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 67F. N winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 50F. NW winds shifting to NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 23C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 74F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 27C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 80F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 21C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 70F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 19C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
